name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 33: The Takkyuu
overview: Simple 1500 Series vol. 33 - The Takkyuu is a Ping Pong game features 2 characters (boy and a girl) and 2 main game modes: - Story mode: Defeat all the opponents to complete the story - Free mode: Choose an opponent to play against The game also features a 2 players vs mode.
